title: Episode 1: Switchtracking
description: The first episode of Hidden Brain explores switchtracking: a common pattern in conversations you'll be accusing your partner of in no time! Plus speedy science, a cup of tea and a song from Adam Cole.
author: ideas@hiddenbrain.org (Hidden Brain Media)
